title: Ginseng Tango
description: A journey of the heart and spirit, Ginseng Tango tracks the author's move to South Korea and her involvements with tango, Buddhism, shamanism, acupuncture, and the challenges of being an independent woman in a patriarchal country. The book navigates the struggles between ancient and modern practices, western and eastern ideals, feminism and Confucianism as North Korea launches missiles.
author: Cheryl Pallant
